21c2fffcc7ab9ef3cbe7857a9cae03aeab4a902e3d192b5a3","license":"BUSL-1.1","urls":["bzz-raw://71f9c77e85e6d5c8447663edd4078cecde127679c49befd0b4f8d8b675f3ea0b","dweb:/ipfs/QmY9g48MGDfFYLtdA8NgEC8dHvnLZGb33wbuQL8pXXqZxp"]}},"version":1}

params.account: The account to get the balance for.

returns._0: The balance of the staked tokens.

params.account: The account to calculate the reward for.

returns._0: The amount of reward earned by the account.
The total reward vested over the duration.
The timestamp of the last reward distribution.
The last time the rewards were updated.
The end of the current reward period.
The current value of the global reward per token accumulator scaled by 1e18.
The last updated reward per token.

params.account: The account to retrieve the reward balance for.

returns._0: The current reward balance of the specified account.
The duration of the rewards cycle.
The total supply of the staked tokens in the vault.

params.account: The account to retrieve the reward for.

returns._0: The current reward balance of the specified account.

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the balance of the staked tokens for an account.

earned(address).notice: Retrieves the amount of reward earned by a specific account.

getRewardForDuration().notice: Retrieves the total reward vested over the specified duration.

lastTimeRewardApplicable().notice: Returns the timestamp of the last reward distribution. This is either the current timestamp (if rewards are still being actively distributed) or the timestamp when the reward duration ended (if all rewards have already been distributed).

lastUpdateTime().notice: Get the last time the rewards were updated.

periodFinish().notice: Get the end of the current reward period.

rewardPerToken().notice: Retrieves the current value of the global reward per token accumulator. This value is the sum of the last checkpoint value and the accumulated value since the last checkpoint. It should increase monotonically over time as more rewards are distributed.

rewardPerTokenStored().notice: Get the last updated reward per token scaled.

rewardRate().notice: Get the reward rate for the current reward period.

rewards(address).notice: Get the reward balance for a specific account.

rewardsDuration().notice: Get the time over which the rewards will be distributed.

totalSupply().notice: Get the total supply of the staked tokens in the vault.

undistributedRewards().notice: Get the amount of undistributed rewards.

userRewardPerTokenPaid(address).notice: Get the user reward per token paid.
